name: James Plotkin
description: '''James Plotkin''' is an American guitarist and producer known for his role in bands such as [[Khanate (band)|Khanate]] and [[OLD (band)|OLD]] but with an extensive catalogue outside these bands. He has played guitar for [[Phantomsmasher]] and [[Scorn (band)|Scorn]] and continues to remix tracks for bands such as [[KK Null]], [[Nadja (band)|Nadja]], [[Sunn O)))]], [[Isis (band)|ISIS]], [[Pelican (band)|Pelican]] and [[Earth (American band)|Earth]]. He works in the genres of [[grindcore]], [[industrial metal]], [[noise music]], [[drone metal]], [[dark ambient]], [[digital hardcore]] and [[post-metal]].
